byline.contributor: Eric Schmitt contributed reporting from Washington, and Anne Barnard from Beirut, Lebanon.

abstract: American troops are training Syrian rebels in Jordan to fights Islamic State extremists.
lead_paragraph: American Special Operations troops have started training a small group of Syrian rebels in Jordan, with the goal of creating a politically moderate force with the fighting prowess to take on Islamic State militants.

headline.main: U.S. Trains Syrian Rebels in Jordan to Fight ISIS
headline.print_headline: U.S. Trains Syrian Rebels in Jordan to Fight ISIS
